results.headline: SAVAGE NIGHTS (MOVIE)

link.suggested_link_text: Read the New York Times Review of Savage Nights

results.summary_short: Bisexual learns he's H.I.V.-positive. Erratic but tense and best as broad portrait of troubled, aimless youth. Late director Collard's own story.

results.summary_short: Seductive inmate becomes government-trained assassin. Flashy, effective remake of ``La Femme Nikita,'' dampened by nasty excesses.

results.headline: MUSIC OF CHANCE, THE (MOVIE)

results.summary_short: Beckett-like fable of bizarre plaything, two drifters and fate. Elegant, cooly inviting version of Auster novel.
